Accelerating brands with AI Agents @ ShopOS
Accelerating brands with AI Agents @ ShopOS
We just raised $20 million to fix commerce.
Say hello to ShopOS

Every store looks the same.
Static pages. Generic recommendations. Brittle intelligence.

Commerce 3.0 will need a new system of record for brands.
Everyone tries to fix this by adding more apps.
A "smarter" search bar, a new recommendations box.
But it's like putting a jet engine on a horse-drawn cart. We learned this the hard way. The real problem is the old PIM/PXM stack itself.

So we're starting over with a new approach: agents.
Instead of software that supports a static store, what if the software is the store? A store that's alive. One that can rebuild parts of itself for every single visitor.

How?
By giving the store an AI workforce.

Think of one agent as your photographer, generating new product shots on the fly. Another is your copywriter. A third is your merchandiser, constantly testing new layouts to see what works best for each person.

The goal is to solve the biggest headaches for brands.
That constant need for new photos and ads? The cost of that should go toward zero. And real 1-on-1 personalization is already possible with today‚Äôs AI.

Look, we're just getting started. This is a huge idea and there's a lot to build.
This is Day 0, and we're convinced this is where commerce is going.
The tech is finally here to make it happen.

We're hiring a small, core team to build this new OS for brands.
